name: Cartoons And Comics 1 Online Quiz | Comics & Cartoons | 10 Questions

questions.text: Starting in the early 1930's what hick horse was Mickey Mouse's friend?
questions.explanation:
Horace Horsecollar.

	That takes you back a bit.

questions.text: ' Rite Of Spring ' is one of the concert pieces Walt Disney used in a movie. Which one?
( True or False ) Cartoonist Al Capp gave the hero in his Lil'Abner ' Gone With The Wind ' parody the name of Wreck Butler?
questions.explanation:
True & true & T & t.

	A fitting name.

questions.text: Whom did Olive Oyl go out with before she met Popeye?
questions.explanation:
Ham Gravey.

	Again way back when.

questions.text: Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster created what comic strip character?
( True or False ) ' Li'l Folks ' was the original name of the comic strip ' Peanuts '?
Name Andy Capp's wife in the comic strip.
Beetle Bailey was stationed at what camp?
